Printed for the American Tract Society,
Title on collective t.p.: Publications of the American Tract Society, vol. 2.
Tracts in this series, preceding and following this number, bear the Society's address at 144 Nassau Street. The American Tract Society was located at 144 Nassau St., New York, from 1827 to 1833.
